create-category-folders.mutation: mutation CreateFolder($input: CreateFolderInput!) { folder { create(language: "en", input: $input, disableComponentValidation: true) { id } } }

json.textContent: Designed by French brothers Ronan and Erwan Bouroullec, this outdoor collection is united by its visual simplicity and core strength. It’s designed in colour and form to integrate effortlessly into a natural landscape or urban setting.

singleLine.text: Palissade Collection by Ronan and Erwan Bouroullec

children.textContent: The Palissade Collection, designed by Ronan and Erwan Bouroullec for HAY, offers a range of sleek and durable outdoor furniture crafted from steel. This collection includes chairs, benches, tables, and lounge sofas, all designed to blend seamlessly into both natural and urban environments while providing timeless style and comfort.
Elegant and minimalist aesthetics that transcend trends.
Crafted from high-quality steel for lasting outdoor use.
Suitable for various outdoor spaces, from gardens to cafes.
Designed for optimal relaxation and support.
Built to withstand the elements and maintain its beauty.

json.textContent: Designed by French brothers Ronan and Erwan Bouroullec, this outdoor collection is united by its visual simplicity and core strength. It’s designed in colour and form to integrate effortlessly into a natural landscape or urban setting.

create-menu-folders.mutation: mutation CreateFolder($input: CreateFolderInput!) { folder { create(language: "en", input: $input, disableComponentValidation: true) { id } } }

create-brands.mutation: mutation CreateDocument($input: CreateDocumentInput!) { document { create(language: "en", input: $input, disableComponentValidation: true) { id } } }

create-products.mutation: mutation CreateProduct($input: CreateProductInput!) { product { create(language: "en", input: $input, disableComponentValidation: true) { id } } }

json.textContent: Adding extra comfort and functionality to Palissade’s collection of chairs and benches, the Palissade Soft Quilted Cushion is specially formed to fit the majority of the Palissade models. Crafted in fabric with a water-repellent finish, the cushion features an anti-slip backing and is filled with a soft and thick foam crumb and silicon fibre ball padding. The fabric has a high UV resistance, meaning it is fade-resistant with good colour fastness properties. The cushions are available in three colours and can be used all year round.

Discover the Palissade lounge sofa, a masterful creation by French designers Ronan and Erwan Bouroullec for HAY. This piece combines sleek, geometric design with exceptional durability, crafted from powder-coated or hot-galvanised steel. Perfect for both urban and natural settings, the Palissade lounge sofa offers sophisticated comfort and style for any outdoor space.

The Palissade lounge sofa embodies the visionary design ethos of French brothers Ronan and Erwan Bouroullec, crafted for HAY to transform outdoor living. With its elegant yet robust construction, this sofa is a testament to the beauty of symmetrical geometry and minimalist aesthetics. Made from either powder-coated or hot-galvanised steel, the Palissade lounge sofa is built to withstand the rigors of outdoor environments while maintaining its refined look.

Designed to seamlessly integrate into various settings—from chic city terraces to tranquil garden retreats—the Palissade lounge sofa provides not just seating but a sophisticated lounging experience. Its clean lines and balanced proportions create a visually striking piece that complements any outdoor décor.

Over time, the sofa's resilient materials will develop a unique patina, adding to its charm and character. This piece is more than just furniture; it’s an investment in enduring style and comfort, designed to become an integral part of your outdoor living space for years to come. Whether hosting a lively gathering or enjoying a quiet moment, the Palissade lounge sofa offers an inviting blend of elegance and practicality.

images.altText: Sky grey Palissade lounge sofa on a pool deck

publish-category-folders.mutation: mutation PublishItems($ids: [ID!]!) { publishItems(language: "en", ids: $ids) { ... on PublishItemsRequest { success { itemId } } } }

publish-menu-folders.mutation: mutation PublishItems($ids: [ID!]!) { publishItems(language: "en", ids: $ids) { ... on PublishItemsRequest { success { itemId } } } }

publish-items.mutation: mutation PublishItems($ids: [ID!]!) { publishItems(language: "en", ids: $ids) { ... on PublishItemsRequest { success { itemId } } } }
